wikipedia_page.main: Frederick John Mathews (7 March 1861 – 9 February 1950) was an English first-class cricketer active 1883 who played for Surrey. He was born in Thames Ditton; died in Surbiton.

response: He died at Bootle, Lancashire, on 1 October 1912. His brothers-in-law, Frederick Mathews, also played first-class cricket.
